textBeforeTable: Servings Per Container about 22 Serving Size about 2 Tbsp (21 g) Nutrition Facts Organic Flax Seed Product Label: Flax seeds are thought to have originated in the ancient Middle East during biblical times. They are an important source of polyunsaturated fatty acids, including Omega-3, plus Magnesium, Zinc and dietary fiber. Flax oil from flax seeds is the richest known source of linolenic acid. It contains protein, mucilage, phytosterols and lignans, which are naturally included at 100 times the level of the next best source, wheat bran. Good source of fiber Add to cereals, salads, and blender drinks Organic flax seeds Organic Flax Seed Product Description: If you are dissatisfied for any reason, we'll give you a full refund and pay return shipping.
